name: View a tweet plugin for twicca
description: Add View this tweet menu to your twicca.  So, you can view the tweet with browser or other twitter clients. Or, you can view twitter with twicca.  ( Below is for Twicca supporters only ) Twicca supports multi-acount, but not supports retweet from other acount.  You can do that by using this plugin. Tap the desired tweet -> View this tweet -> Twicca . Now, you can change your account to retweet. (Simply change acount with right-up button.)  *Check Always to always open a tweet with the app. To cancel it, Do Clear Data in application information. .
